metadata.title: RHSA-2020:2486: unzip security update (Low)
metadata.description:
The unzip utility is used to list, test, and extract files from zip archives.

Security Fix(es):

* unzip: overlapping of files in ZIP container leads to denial of service (CVE-2019-13232)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: overlapping of files in ZIP container leads to denial of service

platform: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.7 Extended Update Support

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
unzip is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
